ssmlGuide.title: How to use SSML easily
ssmlGuide.intro: SSML is like a script with simple markup and the shortcuts above insert ready-to-use tags for you:
ssmlGuide.speak: wraps the entire speech to avoid validation errors.
ssmlGuide.prosodySlowLow: makes speech slow with a low tone.
ssmlGuide.sayAs: ensures numbers are read as natural digits.
ssmlGuide.tips: Quick tips: test small parts, combine tags moderately and replace specific sections if something sounds strange.

export.title: Audio Processing
export.description: Generates the final file by joining all speeches, normalizing volume and exporting to MP3.
export.audioGeneratingBackground: Audio is being generated in the background.

mySubscription.title: My Subscription
mySubscription.willCancelOn: Your subscription will be cancelled on

mySubscription.cancelledAtEnd: Subscription will be cancelled at the end of the period

plansPage.title: Choose Your Plan
plansPage.subtitle: Unlock the full potential of Livrya with our premium plans. More books, more voices, more possibilities.

cancel.question: Can I cancel at any time?
cancel.answer: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time. Access continues until the end of your paid period.

livras.question: What are Livras?
livras.answer: Livras is our virtual currency. You earn them by engaging with the community and can use them to unlock premium features like TTS audio generation.

changePlan.question: Can I change plans later?
changePlan.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade at any time. The price will be prorated accordingly.

successPage.title: Subscription Activated!
successPage.message: Congratulations! You are now a {{plan}} subscriber. Enjoy all the benefits of your new plan!

livraPackages.title: Buy Livras
livraPackages.subtitle: Need more Livras? Purchase packages to unlock premium resources.
